author: oheger
msg: The special methods of INIConfiguration now use the configuration's Synchronizer.

author: oheger
msg: This is an implementation of the Synchronizer interfaced based on the
java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock. It can be used to make
configurations thread-safe if they are accessed concurrently.

author: oheger
msg: Simplified handling of temporary files in test class.

author: pgier
msg: [MDEP-415] Add option to include parent poms in dependency:resolve output

author: rgoers
msg: LOG4J2-244 - Rewrite Appender was ignoring filters on referenced appenders.
